QuestData.Title: To Track a Thief
QuestData.Description: Animal tracks surround the wreckage, tracks made by enormous curved claws. They appear to be raptor tracks.$B$BYour first instinct is that raptor-riders assaulted the caravan, but the impressions aren't deep and there are no non-animal tracks to be seen.$B$BThe tracks head northeast of here toward the east side of Thorn Hill. The answer to this mystery must lie in its shadow.
QuestData.LogDescription: The tracks lead to the east side of Thorn Hill. Follow them and see what you find.
QuestData.RewardText: Before you lies an entire community of raptors, ducking in and out of hovels, snarling at one another, and working together to construct primitive huts. Collections of shiny things surround their nests. Mystery solved!
